category: news
title: "Galaxy AI won't be free for long. Here's when you'll start paying for it."
excerpt: "\"Galaxy AI features will be provided for free until the end of 2025 on supported Samsung Galaxy devices. Different terms may apply for AI features provided by third parties,\" Samsung said. In other words, if you purchase a Samsung Galaxy S24 phone now, you'll get Galaxy AI free for two years. However, by 2026, be prepared to pay up."
